TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DateTimePicker extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示 Windows 控制項，這個控制項允許使用者選取日期和時間，並使用指定的格式來顯示日期和時間。

span.span: Represents a Windows control that allows the user to select a date and a time and to display the date and time with a specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項用來允許使用者選取的日期和時間，並顯示該日期與時間中指定的格式。The control is used to allow the user to select a date and time, and to display that date and time in the specified format. 控制項可讓您輕鬆地使用日期和時間，因為它會自動處理大量資料驗證。The control makes it easy to work with dates and times because it handles a lot of the data validation automatically. > [!NOTE] > 控制項僅支援西曆。The control only supports Gregorian calendars. 用來代表日期，控制項會出現在兩個部分： 下拉式清單中，以表示文字，並按一下清單旁邊的向下箭頭時出現的行事曆的日期。When used to represent a date, the control appears in two parts: a drop-down list with a date represented in text, and a calendar that appears when you click the down-arrow next to the list. 行事曆看起來像控制項，可用來選取多個日期。The calendar looks like the control, which can be used for selecting multiple dates. 如需詳細資訊控制項，請參閱[MonthCalendar 控制項概觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/monthcalendar-control-overview-windows-forms.md)。For more information about the control, see [MonthCalendar Control Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/monthcalendar-control-overview-windows-forms.md). 您可以設定來變更控制項的行事曆部分面貌， ， ， ， ，和屬性。You can change the look of the calendar portion of the control by setting the , , , , , and properties. 若要使用微調按鈕控制項 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項） 來調整日期/時間值，將屬性設`true`。To use a spin button control (also known as an up-down control) to adjust the date/time value, set the property to `true`. 選取控制項時，行事曆不將下拉式清單。The calendar will not drop down when the control is selected. 您可以調整的日期和時間，個別選取每個項目，然後使用向上和向下按鈕來變更值。The date and time can be adjusted by selecting each element individually and using the up and down buttons to change the value. 屬性包含目前的日期和時間控制項設定。The property contains the current date and time the control is set to. 您可以使用屬性或的適當成員取得日期和時間值。You can use the property or the appropriate member of to get the date and time value. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：日期與 Windows Form DateTimePicker 控制項設定和傳回](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-and-return-dates-with-the-windows-forms-datetimepicker-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Set and Return Dates with the Windows Forms DateTimePicker Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-and-return-dates-with-the-windows-forms-datetimepicker-control.md). 您可以限制日期和時間可以藉由設定中選取和屬性。You can limit the dates and times that can be selected by setting the and properties. 值可以顯示在所設定的四個格式屬性： ， ， ，或。The values can be displayed in four formats, which are set by the property: , , , or . 預設的日期是。The default date is . 如果您想都會顯示為挑選，或編輯而不是日期的時間控制項，將屬性設`true`並屬性設。If you want the to appear as a control for picking or editing times instead of dates, set the property to `true` and the property to . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：使用 DateTimePicker 控制項顯示時間](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-time-with-the-datetimepicker-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Display Time with the DateTimePicker Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-time-with-the-datetimepicker-control.md). 如果屬性設定為，您可以建立您自己的格式樣式，藉由設定屬性和建置自訂格式字串。If the property is set to , you can create your own format style by setting the property and building a custom format string. 自訂格式字串可以是自訂欄位的字元和其他常值字元的組合。The custom format string can be a combination of custom field characters and other literal characters. 比方說，您可以在這裡顯示的日期作為 「 6 月 01，2012年-星期五 」 藉由設定"MMMM dd，yyyy-dddd"的屬性。For example, you can display the date as "June 01, 2012 - Friday" by setting the property to "MMMM dd, yyyy - dddd". 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：使用 Windows Form DateTimePicker 控制項的自訂格式來顯示日期](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/display-a-date-in-a-custom-format-with-wf-datetimepicker-control.md)並[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [How to: Display a Date in a Custom Format with the Windows Forms DateTimePicker Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/display-a-date-in-a-custom-format-with-wf-datetimepicker-control.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). > [!CAUTION] > 當是資料繫結和備份值變更為`null`，值將不會更新，並將保留先前的值。When a is data-bound and the backing value is changed to `null`, the value of the will not be updated and the previous value will be retained. 在其中這個行為並不適合 （比方說，當使用一組資料繫結控制項分頁的資料錄集） 的情況下使用事件的類別來設定的值辨識為`null`。In situations where this behavior is not desirable (for example, when using a set of data-bound controls to page through a recordset) use the event of the class to set the to a value recognizable as a `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新的執行個體控制，並將它初始化。The following code example creates an new instance of a control and initializes it. 控制項的屬性設定。The control's property is set. 此外，屬性設定，讓控制項顯示，和屬性設定，以便為微調按鈕控制項顯示控制項。Also, the property is set so that the control displays a , and the property is set so that the control is displayed as a spin button control. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單並呼叫`CreateMyDateTimePicker`範例表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call the `CreateMyDateTimePicker` method in the example form's constructor or event handling method. [!code-cpp[Classic DateTimePicker Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DateTimePicker Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DateTimePicker Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DateTimePicker Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DateTimePicker Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DateTimePicker Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定套用至月曆的字型樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the font style applied to the calendar.

value.span: ，表示套用至月曆的字型樣式。

span.span: A that represents the font style applied to the calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開始隨著 Windows Vista，以及每種佈景主題，設定這個屬性可能不會變更行事曆的外觀。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果 Windows 已設定為使用 Aero 佈景主題，設定這個屬性沒有任何作用。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 這是因為使用衍生自目前的作業系統主題在執行階段外觀呈現行事曆的更新的版本。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果您想要使用這個屬性，並啟用舊版的行事曆，您可以停用您的應用程式視覺化樣式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 停用視覺化樣式，可能會影響的外觀和行為的應用程式中其他控制項。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要停用視覺化樣式，在 Visual Basic 中的，開啟 專案設計工具，並取消核取**啟用 XP 視覺化樣式**核取方塊。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要停用 C# 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 Program.cs，並標記為註解`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize the property. 這個範例會建立新控制項，並將它加入至的集合，然後初始化並屬性以動態方式定義的。This example creates a new control, adds it to the collection of a , and then initializes the property to a dynamically defined . [!code-cpp[DateTimePicker.CalendarFont#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DateTimePicker.CalendarFont/CPP/calendarfont.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTimePicker.CalendarFont#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DateTimePicker.CalendarFont/CS/calendarfont.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTimePicker.CalendarFont#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DateTimePicker.CalendarFont/VB/calendarfont.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當會建立，這個屬性一開始設為等於欄位值。When a is created, this property is initially set equal to the field value. 尾隨日期是在前一個月份的結束日期或下個月用來填滿日曆的開始日期。The trailing dates are the ending dates from the previous month or the beginning dates from the next month used to fill the calendar. 開始隨著 Windows Vista，以及每種佈景主題，設定這個屬性可能不會變更行事曆的外觀。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果 Windows 已設定為使用 Aero 佈景主題，設定這個屬性沒有任何作用。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 這是因為使用衍生自目前的作業系統主題在執行階段外觀呈現行事曆的更新的版本。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果您想要使用這個屬性，並啟用舊版的行事曆，您可以停用您的應用程式視覺化樣式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 停用視覺化樣式，可能會影響的外觀和行為的應用程式中其他控制項。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要停用視覺化樣式，在 Visual Basic 中的，開啟 專案設計工具，並取消核取**啟用 XP 視覺化樣式**核取方塊。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要停用 C# 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 Program.cs，並標記為註解`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.

summary.span: 取得或設定自訂的日期時間格式字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom date/time format string.

value.span: 表示自訂日期時間格式的字串。

span.span: A string that represents the custom date/time format.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要顯示包含日期和時間分隔符號的字串常值或字串的格式，您必須使用子字串中的逸出字元。To display string literals that contain date and time separators or to format strings, you must use escape characters in the substring. 例如，若要顯示的日期作為 「 6 月 15 在下午 12:00"，設定"MMMM dd 'at' t:mm tt"的屬性。For example, to display the date as "June 15 at 12:00 PM", set the property to "MMMM dd 'at' t:mm tt". 如果不加上"at"子字串的逸出字元，結果會是"年 6 月 15 aP 下午 12:00"因為"t"字元被視為一個字母的上下/下午。If the "at" substring is not enclosed by escape characters, the result is "June 15 aP 12:00PM" because the "t" character is read as the one-letter A.M./P.M. 格式字串 （請參閱以下的格式字串資料表）。format string (see the format string table below). 格式字串可組合為格式化的日期和時間。The format strings can be combined to format the date and time. 例如，若要顯示的日期和時間為 2001 年 06 月 15 日下午 12:00，這個屬性應該設定為 「 MM '/' dd '/' yyyy hh': ' mm tt"。For example, to display the date and time as 06/15/2001 12:00 PM, this property should be set to "MM'/'dd'/'yyyy hh':'mm tt". 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). > [!NOTE] > 屬性必須設為讓這個屬性會影響顯示的日期和時間格式。The property must be set to for this property to affect the formatting of the displayed date and time. 下表列出所有有效的格式字串和其描述。The following table lists all the valid format strings and their descriptions. |格式化字串Format string|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| |dd|一個或兩位數日期。The one- or two-digit day.| |dddd|兩位數日期。The two-digit day. 單一位數的日期值會加上 0。Single-digit day values are preceded by a 0.| |dddddd|三個字元的星期縮寫。The three-character day-of-week abbreviation.| |dddddddd|完整的星期名稱。The full day-of-week name.| |hh|一個或兩位數的小時，12 小時制的小時。The one- or two-digit hour in 12-hour format.| |hhhh|兩位數的小時 12 小時制的小時。The two-digit hour in 12-hour format. 單一數字的值會加上 0。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |HH|一個或兩個位數的小時，24 小時制的小時。The one- or two-digit hour in 24-hour format.| |HHHH|24 小時制的兩位數小時。The two-digit hour in 24-hour format. 單一數字的值會加上 0。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |mm|一個或兩位數分鐘。The one- or two-digit minute.| |mmmm|兩位數分鐘。The two-digit minute. 單一數字的值會加上 0。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |MM|一個或兩位數的月份數。The one- or two-digit month number.| |MMMM|兩位數月份。The two-digit month number. 單一數字的值會加上 0。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |MMMMMM|三個字元的月份縮寫。The three-character month abbreviation.| |MMMMMMMM|完整月份名稱。The full month name.| |秒s|一個或兩位數的秒數。The one- or two-digit seconds.| |ssss|兩位數的秒數。The two-digit seconds. 單一數字的值會加上 0。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |tt|單字母上下/下午The one-letter A.M./P.M. 縮寫 （上午abbreviation (A.M. 會顯示為"A"）。is displayed as "A").| |tttt|兩個字母上下/下午The two-letter A.M./P.M. 縮寫 （上午abbreviation (A.M. 顯示為 「 是 」）。is displayed as "AM").| |yy|一位數的年份 （2001年顯示為"1"）。The one-digit year (2001 is displayed as "1").| |yyyy|（顯示為 "01"2001年） 年後兩位數字。The last two digits of the year (2001 is displayed as "01").| |yyyyyyyy|完整的年 （2001年顯示為"2001"）。The full year (2001 is displayed as "2001").| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性，讓會顯示為 「 年 6 月 01，2001年-星期五 」 日期。The following code example sets the property so that the will display the date as "June 01, 2001 - Friday". 此程式碼會假設執行個體上建立控制項。This code assumes that an instance of a control has been created on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定日期/時間格式中顯示的日期。This property determines the date/time format the date is displayed in. 日期/時間格式根據使用者的地區設定，其作業系統中。The date/time format is based on the user's regional settings in their operating system. > [!NOTE] > 屬性必須設為如會影響顯示的日期和時間格式的屬性。The property must be set to for the property to affect the formatting of the displayed date and time. 若要顯示中的唯一時間，將來，而屬性設`true`。To display only time in a , set the to , and the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性，讓會顯示為 「 年 6 月 01，2001年-星期五 」 日期。The following code example sets the property so that the will display the date as "June 01, 2001 - Friday". 此程式碼會假設執行個體上建立控制項。This code assumes that an instance of a control has been created on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，核取方塊會顯示在控制項中的日期左邊。When the property is set to `true`, a check box is displayed to the left of the date in the control. 選取此核取方塊時，就可以更新的日期/時間值。When the check box is selected, the date/time value can be updated. 清除核取方塊，則日期/時間值時，無法變更。When the check box is cleared, the date/time value is unable to be changed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新的執行個體控制，並將它初始化。The following code example creates an new instance of a control and initializes it. 控制項的屬性設定。The control's property is set. 此外，屬性設定，讓控制項顯示，和屬性設定，以便為微調按鈕控制項 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項） 顯示控制項。Also, the property is set so that the control displays a , and the property is set so that the control is displayed as a spin button control (also known as an up-down control). remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`、 微調按鈕控制項 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項），而不是下拉式行事曆、 用來調整時間值。When the property is set to `true`, a spin button control (also known as an up-down control), rather than a drop-down calendar, is used to adjust time values. 您可以調整的日期和時間，個別選取每個項目，然後使用向上和向下按鈕來變更值。The date and time can be adjusted by selecting each element individually and using the up and down buttons to change the value. 若要顯示中的唯一時間，將屬性設，而屬性設`true`。To display only time in a , set the property to , and the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新的執行個體控制，並將它初始化。The following code example creates an new instance of a control and initializes it. 控制項的屬性設定。The control's property is set. 此外，屬性設定，讓控制項顯示，和屬性設定，以便為微調按鈕控制項顯示控制項。Also, the property is set so that the control displays a , and the property is set so that the control is displayed as a spin button control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的字串相當於與適當的格式設定或套用自訂格式設定的屬性。The string returned by this property is equivalent to the property with the appropriate formatting or custom formatting applied. 比方說，如果屬性設定到 2001 年 06/01/12:00: 00AM 同時屬性設定為"dddd，MMMM dd，yyyy"，屬性值是"Friday，June 01，2001"。For example, if the property is set to 06/01/2001 12:00:00 AM while the property is set to "dddd, MMMM dd, yyyy", the property value is "Friday, June 01, 2001". 設定這個屬性時，必須轉換成的執行個體的字串類別。When setting this property, the string must be convertible to an instance of the class. 您可定義的自訂格式，導致無法轉換成有效的字串值。It is possible to define a custom format that results in a string that cannot be converted to a valid value. 因為這個緣故，傳回從字串屬性可能會導致錯誤，如果將它傳遞回屬性。Because of this, the string returned from the property might cause an error if it is passed back to the property. 如果字串無法轉換成日期/時間值，類別會擲回。If the string cannot be converted to a date/time value, the class throws a .
